title: [Old Ta'Faendryl, River Edge]
description: Huge chunks of granite, half-submerged in the center of the river to the north, do little to impede the progress of the rushing water.  Dark and bulky, with edges rounded off by the constant erosion of the water, the massive boulders have the appearance of a herd of huge sea creatures lurking in the oily depths of the water.

Huge chunks of granite, half-submerged in the center of the river to the north, do little to impede the progress of the rushing brown water.  Grey and wet, with edges rounded off by the constant erosion of the water, the massive boulders have the appearance of a herd of huge sea creatures basking in the sun.
